Gaon

Group (2021-present):
Xdinary Heroes

Introduction

Kwak Jiseok, better known as Gaon, is a South Korean rapper and musician under JYP Entertainment. He made his official debut as the electric guitarist and rapper of the band Xdinary Heroes on December 6, 2021. He was revealed as the third member of the group.
